item.title: github: Secret scanning alert assignees, security campaigns are generally available
item.description:
GitHub announced that secret scanning alert assignees and security campaigns are now generally available. Alert assignees will receive email notifications to help teams track and remediate secret scanning alerts more effectively.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: azure: [In preview] Public Preview: Recommended alerts for Azure Monitor Workspace
item.description:
Azure Monitor is in public preview with one-click enablement of recommended alerts in the Azure portal for Azure Monitor Managed Service for Prometheus customers. These alerts monitor Azure Monitor Workspace ingestion limits to help prevent metric ingestion issues.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: [In preview] Public Preview: Dynamic threshold for Log search alerts
item.description:
Azure Monitor now supports dynamic thresholding for Log search alerts in public preview, automatically calculating appropriate alert thresholds so you don’t have to set them manually.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: github: Dependabot alerts API offset-based pagination parameters deprecated
item.description:
GitHub has removed offset-based pagination parameters (page, first, last) from all Dependabot alerts REST API endpoints; only cursor-based parameters (before, after, per_page) are supported going forward.

  • Source: GitHub
